title: Makki ki roti
ingredients: ['200g fine cornmeal (polenta)', '200g coarse cornmeal (polenta)', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 to 2 teaspoons carom seeds (ajwain)', '50g wheat flour (optional)', '110g boiled mashed potatoes', 'warm water', '7 to 9 teaspoons vegetable oil, ghee or butter (optional)']
